Recently, we launched Talabat Market,

So two years ago,

because we wanted to serve customers better,
and actually innovate a lot more.

This is one of the reasons
 why we started looking at migrating our services
from on-premise to AWS.

 re-architecting of our applications,

to EKS, and at the same time, 
using serverless code Lambda.

Excellent.

and then some of them

and some of them fall

because Talabat,

 what they're used for?

So when we started this migration journey, 
two years ago,
then last year, COVID happened.

During this COVID, we could not serve our customers faster, 
as much as we wanted to.

So one of the things we thought 
was we needed to accelerate this migration journey,

of our application to Beanstalk.

And there is other categories of applications,

Yes, because the applications 
that were migrated to EKS and Lambda,
were less complex applications,

and it doesn't take us a lot of time

But applications that we were moving to Beanstalk 
will take us a lot of time

to actually understand how it works, 
and to actually provide the higher scalability.

And because we were already hitting the limit 
of how much we can serve our customer,

we needed to just do something 
that we call re-platforming.

And Beanstalk provides this 
because we did not have to spend a lot of time,

to understand how to migrate,
 I mean, how to scale properly.
